title: "Mixed-effects models"
output: html_document
---




```{r introduction, echo=FALSE, include=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

## load packages
library(lattice)
library(survival)
library(JMbayes)
    
## linear mixed effects model
lmeFit <- lme(CD4 ~ obstime + obstime:drug, data = aids,
              random = ~ obstime | patient)
summary(lmeFit)

lmeFit1 <- lme(CD4 ~ obstime + obstime:drug, data = aids,
    random = ~ 1 | patient)
summary(lmeFit1)

lmeFit2 <- lme(CD4 ~ obstime + obstime:drug, data = aids,
    random = list(patient = pdDiag(form = ~ obstime)))
summary(lmeFit2)


```
